I'm so sick of eating the same disgusting food every day. I can't afford anything better, but I'm just so tired of it.
Have you ever tried learning to cook new dishes? It could be a fun way to spice up your meals and get creative in the kitchen.
Ugh, cooking is such a chore. Plus, I don't have the time or money to go buy a bunch of ingredients.
I totally get it, cooking can be time-consuming and expensive sometimes. But it can also be a great way to relax and express yourself. Maybe you could start small and try a few simple recipes?
I guess that could be a good idea. It's just hard to get excited about cooking when I'm already so frustrated with everything else.
I understand. It can be tough to find motivation when things aren't going so well. But trying something new might give you a little boost of energy and excitement.
Yeah, I suppose you're right. Maybe I'll give it a shot. Can you recommend any easy recipes for beginners?

Yes, please! That would be great. Thanks for the suggestion.
